item.description:
This month Rick Waldron will teach us how to create interactive, immersive video experiences with HTML5 & Popcorn.js. Rick has been the lead developer on the Popcorn.js project, working with Mozilla & PBS to redefine the the online video experience.

Popcorn.js is an HTML5 Video Framework that allows users to mix dynamic web content with HTML video sources.

Check out Popcorn here: http://webmademovies.org.

Microsoft will provide pizza again. What a generous organization! 

Talk begins aprox. 6:45-7:15pm

After the presentation | demonstration, we will go around the room introducing ourselves and asking the group for advice | opinions on any JavaScript-related issues members are facing.
item.why: This month Rick Waldron will teach us how to create interactive, immersive video experiences with HTML5 & Popcorn.js. Rick has been the lead developer on the Popcorn.js project, working with Mozilla & PBS to redefine the the online video experience.
item.name: Advanced HTML5 Video with Popcorn.js
